abstract:
I like this series because it really makes me feel like I better know where things are now, just from you talking about landmarks in each specific arrondissement 😂

Thanks for doing what you do! Have a great weekend x
Musee D'orsay is worth a separate video!!!  Looking forward to it.  Love this series!!!
